name: 螢幕判官 Behind the Screen
description: “Behind the Screen” is a game including stuffs like puzzles, stealth modes and fighting that you can still easily handle. And many stories are inspired by actual historical events in Taiwan. If you dig deep into our stories, you will find it is not just an “easy” game.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: HD 4000 Storage: 3 GB available space
